summary: Wade preset for Racemenu with custom complexion
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]Installation[/size][/u]

[size=3]Place the 0_Lordminion777.jslot  file in your Presets folder - G:\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data\SKSE\Plugins\CharGen\Presets[/size]
[size=3]The Preset should now be available in the Racemenu Preset section under the name [/size][b][size=3]0_Lordminion777
[/size][/b][color=#ffff00][size=4]Race is Breton[/size][/color]

[/b][b][size=4][u]Requirements

[/u][/size][/b][color=#1e84cc][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/28363/?][size=3]Beards by Hvergelmir [/size][/url][size=3]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]Racemenu by Expired[/url]
[/size]
[size=4]
[/size][/color][u]Recommended
[/u][size=3]
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27815/?tab=3&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodimages%2F%3Fuser%3D0%26id%3D27815%26gid%3D110]Fine Face Textures for Men by urshi [/url]- [color=#ffff00]I'm including an optional edit of the Maleheaddetail_age40.dds complexion with this preset, it's slightly softer and less aging.[/color] Their skin textures are lit.
To install this, save a copy of the original Maleheaddetail_age40.dds found in G:\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim\Data\Textures\Actors\Character\male and keep it somewhere safe if you ever wish to revert. Overwrite the old file with mine and you're good to go.
[/size][size=4]
[/size][color=#ff0000][size=4]PERMISSIONS 
You can use this for screenshots, videos, whatever you want really but please refrain from doing anything pornographic and NSFW, remember that Wade Barnes / Lordminion777 is a real person[/size][/color]
author: Nilryth
